three of the men wore kimonos .

outside the festivities were almost over .
hello kitty party favors were given out .
output.sentences: Trying to be asian, white people sat on the floor to eat their meal.
They also wore kimonos to embrace the Japanese ways.
They tried to walk around on the wooden sandals that they found.
Then they visited a Japanese festival to enjoy the festivities.
After the party, they took photos of the kitty figurines they got as favors.
